ygData.subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Begging taunt
ygData.msgSnippet: You cannot beg with auto attack enabled.  So, you must stop attacking, hit beg key, and renew the attack.  I havnt had a success yet but my begging skill is
ygData.messageBody:
You cannot beg with auto attack enabled. So, you must stop attacking, hit
beg key, and renew the attack. I havnt had a success yet but my begging
skill is like...1 That skill MUST be there for some reason other than
making city guards kill you!

Xillith

>From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>

> > A) Can't taunt as well as a warrior
>
>I recently heard that a tank should also have the beg command hot keyed.
>This adds an extra taunt. Annoy the mob by begging from it. I thought it
>was a hilarious idea.
>
>Hugs and snuggles, Feradwynn Moonspinner
